(#{info.userName}, #{info.tweetDate}, #{info.tweetUrl}, #{info.tweetContent}, #{info.mediaUrl}, #{info.mediaType}, #{info.savedFilename}, #{info.favoriteCount}, #{info.retweetCount}, #{info.replyCount}, #{info.displayName})

insert into twitter_info (user_name, display_name, path, join_time, number, image_number, video_number) values
